entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
